# Brain and  Behavioral Dynamics Lab

![Gilmore Lab Logo](../protocols/imgs/GilmoreLabLogo.png)  

## Meetings

We will meet on **Thursday** mornings from **8-8:50am** in person in room 127 Moore or by Zoom. Details will be provided as to which location at least 24 hours before the next meeting time.

## Expectations

- Attend and Participate in all meetings
- If a meeting will be missed, notify the lab manager PRIOR to missing the meeting by Discord or email
- Check out the meeting minutes on the [Lab Website](https://gilmore-lab.github.io/lab-meetings.html) to see what was missed.
- Come prepared for the meeting by completing any homework assigments.



## Required Training

- [CITI Training](https://citi.psu.edu/)
- 2022 Annual Compliance Training
- Understanding Title IX at Penn State
- Building a Safe Penn State: Reporting Child Abuse
- Clery Act Training
- Background Check (only if collecting data on minors)

## Accounts needed

Account creation requests will be sent out with instructions via Asana.

- Use [Asana](https://app.asana.com/) for task assignment
- Use [Discord](https://discord.com/) for team communication
- Use [Git Hub](https://github.com/) for collaboration and version control
- Use [Datacamp](https://www.datacamp.com/) to learn R
- Use [R Studio on the TLT Server](https://lat.tlt.psu.edu/home/remoteaccess/oss-web-apps/)

## Frequently Used Resources

- Learn R Markdown. Here is my favorite [Markdown Cheatsheet](https://github.com/adam-p/markdown-here/wiki/Markdown-Cheatsheet) but you will find plenty if you look.
